description: A rule has been deleted in the Windows Firewall exception list.
name: Delete Rule in Windows Firewall with Advanced Security
query: (winlog.event_id:("2006" OR "2033") AND (NOT ((ModifyingApplication:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\svchost.exe" OR ModifyingApplication:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*)) OR (ModifyingApplication:C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Platform\\* AND ModifyingApplication:*\\MsMpEng.exe))))
author: frack113
